mapper.select: SELECT fpb.id AS boardId, fpb.summary, fpb.title, fpb.content, u.name AS authorName, fpb.created_at AS createdAt FROM finale_project_board fpb JOIN user u ON fpb.user_id = u.id WHERE fpb.project_id = #{finaleId} AND u.generation_id = #{generationId} AND fpb.is_deleted = false ORDER BY fpb.created_at DESC

SELECT fpb.id AS boardId, fpb.summary, fpb.title, fpb.content, u.name AS authorName, fpb.created_at AS createdAt, ftm.user_id AS memberId, mu.name AS memberName, ftm.role AS memberRole FROM finale_project_board fpb JOIN user u ON fpb.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN finale_team_member ftm ON ftm.finale_team_id = fpb.team_id LEFT JOIN user mu ON ftm.user_id = mu.id WHERE fpb.id = #{boardId} AND fpb.is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finale_project_board ( project_id, team_id, summary, title, content, user_id, created_at ) VALUES ( #{projectId}, #{teamId}, #{summary}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, CURRENT_DATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE finale_project_board SET summary = #{board.summary}, title = #{board.title}, content = #{board.content}, updated_at = CURRENT_DATE WHERE id = #{boardId} AND is_deleted = false
UPDATE finale_team SET submitted_at = CURRENT_DATE WHERE id = ( SELECT team_id FROM finale_project_board WHERE id = #{boardId} )
UPDATE finale_project_board SET is_deleted = true, updated_at = CURRENT_DATE WHERE id = #{boardId} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.name AS userName, ftm.role AS memberRole FROM finale_team_member ftm JOIN user u ON ftm.user_id = u.id WHERE ftm.finale_team_id = ( SELECT team_id FROM finale_project_board WHERE id = #{boardId} )
